name: Cheaker
discri: A classic board game played on an 8x8 grid where two players take turns moving their pieces diagonally. The goal is to capture all of the opponent's pieces by jumping over them. It promotes strategic thinking and can be enjoyed by players of all ages, making it perfect for relaxed, engaging play at home or gatherings.
